# Problem 1
Load data
```{r, get_brfss}
library(p8105.datasets)
data("brfss_smart2010") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() 
```
```{r, filter_brfss}
brfss_smart2010 %>% 
  filter(Topic == "Overall Health") %>% 
  distinct(Response) %>% 
  mutate(Response = factor(Response, levels = c("Excellent", "Very good", 
                                                "Good", "Fair", "Poor"))) %>%
  arrange(Response)
```
